languages.text: [Солгать] "Спрашиваешь! Я не просто видел{mf||а} Его, я лично давал{mf||а} Ему советы по управлению Империумом".

traits.locale_text: "Спрашиваешь! Я не просто видел{mf||а} Его, я лично давал{mf||а} Ему советы по управлению Империумом".

languages.text: [Lie] "Have I? I have not just seen Him, I have personally advised Him on the ruling of the Imperium."

languages.text: [说谎]“亲眼见过？我不仅亲眼见过祂，而且还私下里给祂提过治理帝国的建议。”
languages.original_text: [Lie] "Have I? I have not just seen Him, I have personally advised Him on the ruling of the Imperium."

languages.text: [Mentir] «¿Que si lo he visto? No solo lo he visto, le he asesorado personalmente sobre la administración del Imperium».
languages.original_text: [Lie] "Have I? I have not just seen Him, I have personally advised Him on the ruling of the Imperium."

languages.text: [Yalan söyle] "Gördüm mü? O'nu sadece görmekle kalmadım, İmparatorluk'un idaresi konusunda bizzat kendisine danışmanlık yaptım."
languages.original_text: [Lie] "Have I? I have not just seen Him, I have personally advised Him on the ruling of the Imperium."

languages.text: [嘘を付く]「{mf|俺|私}が？陛下に会っただけでなく、帝国の支配について個人的に助言したことがある」
languages.original_text: [Lie] "Have I? I have not just seen Him, I have personally advised Him on the ruling of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}が？陛下に会っただけでなく、帝国の支配について個人的に助言したことがある」
「{mf|俺|私}が？陛下に会っただけでなく、帝国の支配について個人的に助言したことがある」

languages.text: [Mentir] « Ah oui ? Je ne l'ai pas seulement vu, je l'ai personnellement conseillé sur la gestion de l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: [Lie] "Have I? I have not just seen Him, I have personally advised Him on the ruling of the Imperium."

languages.text: [Lügen] "Habe ich das? Ich habe ihn nicht nur gesehen, ich habe ihn persönlich beraten, wie das Imperium zu regieren ist."
